_________________________________________________________

Half twin-stick shooter, half pong, half tanks/combat Battle Bash is a 2-4 player party type game designed to be played with 4 360 controllers(or any xinput gamepad). One player may use keyboard/mouse if you only have one controller.

Loosely based on the Combat atari 2600 game, four tanks battle for supremacy. There is a major issue, you have but one bouncy missile to launch. You must hit the enemy, or go retrieve your shell in order to shoot again. Boards have hazards, bounce walls, portals, power-ups, and more to shake things up.
